ModMetaData.name: BrawlersDontMindGrenades
ModMetaData.author: XandrMoro
ModMetaData.description: Thats it. Pawns with brawler trait do not get mood penalty for having grenades equipped and theres no alert. Probably quite OP without CE. It also uses hacky approach to detect grenades (checking if the def name contains Weapon_Grenade), so other mods that add grenades might not necessarily be compatible.
